# **Exercise:** 

> 1. Try forward and stepwise selection procedures to see if they deliver the same best model;
> 2. Get ROC curve and AUC for both full model and the best model you obtained;
> 3. Calculate MR, FPR, FNR, the asymmetric cost for both full model and the best model you obtained.
